summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in Block 40, S. A. Bell's 2nd Addition, being the alley between Terry Avenue and Boren Avenue, extending from Virginia Street to Lenora Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 9012 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
